name: CfP (July 30, 2024): BROLLY. Journal of Social Sciences (London, UK) – NEW SERIES
content: CfP (July 30, 2024): BROLLY. Journal of Social Sciences (London, UK) – NEW SERIES Vol. 5, No. 2, August 2024 (General Topic) Submission Deadline: July 30, 2024 No processing or publication fees. #OpenAccess ISSN 2516-869X (Print) ISSN 2516-8703 (Online) Web: https://www.journals.lapub.co.uk/index.php/Brolly Email: brolly@journals.lapub.co.uk BROLLY welcomes submissions of original papers that contribute to cutting-edge research, unveiling the nuances and complexities of the ever-changing contemporary world. Embark on an immersive journey into the realm of humanities, wherein each edition of BROLLY showcases a carefully curated selection of articles across philosophy, sociology, digital humanities, political science, ethics, education, semiotics, psychology, communication, economics and cultural studies. Published by: London Academic Publishing www.lapub.co.uk www.journals.lapub.co.uk
